# The `SourceMgr` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Abstracting the input code sequence (a sequence of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>) and assigning unique identifiers to every instruction in the sequence. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::mca::SourceMgr</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Abstracting the input code sequence (a sequence of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>) and assigning unique identifiers to every instruction in the sequence.

Definition at line 29 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>.

### hasNext() {#afe16a1071f44255130ad8e0a8b47be4f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual bool llvm::mca::SourceMgr::hasNext () const">
Whether there is any <em><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#a6194ec8d4ff9d0552963291008b31ee7">SourceRef</a></em> to inspect / peek next.

Note that returning false from this doesn&#39;t mean the instruction stream has ended.
